com.cmart.util

Class CheckInputs

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cmart.util.CheckInputs

  • public class CheckInputs
extends java.lang.Object
    This class checks the parameters sent to the pages. This is in a static class as lots of the pages take the same parameters, so it saves each page having to implement them The parameters since we made the client generator, so we know what we are passing. However, in real life people will try to break and hack whatever you make
    Since:
    0.1
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Andy (andrewtu@cmu.edu)

        public static long checkUserID(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
                        throws Error
        Makes sure the userID is valid for use in the system. It must be present and greater than zero. Returns the userID if valid, otherwise it throws an exception that describes the problem

        Returns:

      • checkSuppressOutput

        public static boolean checkSuppressOutput(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Checks the suppressOutput option. The suppressOutput option tells the page to clear the output writer before it returns the page, this reduces the amount of network traffic. This might not be too useful in the final system as the client generator will need the page data for most pages
        Parameters:
        request - The request to read the parameter from
        Returns:
        boolean true if we are to suppress the output, false otherwise

      • checkProcessingLoop

        public static int checkProcessingLoop(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Gets the processing loop parameter. The processing loop parameter can be used to increase to increase the processing on the app tier without having to increase load on the DB.
        Parameters:
        request - The request to read the parameter from
        Returns:
        int The number of times to loop the processing of the page
